Source.Name: mailspring
Source.Summary: A beautiful, fast and maintained fork of Nylas Mail by one of the original authors.
Source.Description: Leaving Nylas Mail? Mailspring is a new version by one of the original authors. It's faster, leaner, and shipping today! Mailspring replaces the JavaScript mailsync code in Nylas Mail with a new C++ sync engine based on Mailcore2. It uses roughly half the RAM and CPU of Nylas Mail and idles with almost zero "CPU Wakes", which translates to great battery life. A major overhaul of the package manager and dependency tree mean it launches faster too. You might not even notice it's an Electron app!
